template.name: Scheduler

transition.label: windowEnd() >= t_time - sats[RQ].offset && windowEnd() < t_time - sats[RQ].offset + jobs[task_to_check].execution_time && windowStart() <= t_time - sats[RQ].offset && station_to_check
station_to_check = false
windowEnd() >= t_time - sats[RQ].offset + jobs[task_to_check].execution_time && windowStart() <= t_time - sats[RQ].offset && station_to_check
station_to_check = false, overStation()
